member.summary: Utility method/macro.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.PrivacyLevel
member.summary: Indicates which HP Data Confidentiality Label will be displayed by the control.
member.remarks: NOTE: For more info on the differences between the levels, refer to "http://legal.hp.com/legal/files/labels.asp".

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.FeedbackUrl
member.summary: The URL of the Feedback hyperlink in the Footer.
member.remarks: Note that this property doesn't necessarily have to point to a web page. For example, you can cause it to open/create an email by using standard "mailto:" syntax.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.SupportUrl
member.summary: The URL of the Support hyperlink in the Footer.
member.remarks: Note that this property doesn't necessarily have to point to a web page. For example, you can cause it to open/create an email by using standard "mailto:" syntax.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.TargetFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target window or frame which is targeted by this control's actions.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.Version
member.summary: Optional. Gets or sets the version number of your site that will be displayed in the control.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.SeparatorColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the separator.
member.remarks: HTML color names (e.g. \"red\") and RGB color codes (e.g. \"#FF0000\") are both acceptable inputs.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.SeparatorHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical height of the separator, measured in pixels.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.EnablePageRevisionInfo
member.summary: Enables or disables the automatic display of the page's "last modified date".
member.remarks: The page revision info is normally displayed near the site's Version Number.

member.name: T:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.ContentPrivacyLevel
member.summary: Contains all of the HP Data Confidentiality Labels/Levels supported by the PortalFooter control.
member.remarks: NOTE: For more info on the differences between the levels, refer to "http://legal.hp.com/legal/files/labels.asp".

member.name: F:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.ContentPrivacyLevel.Unspecified
member.summary: Indicates that the system should decide which label to display (if any).

member.name: F:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.ContentPrivacyLevel.Restricted
member.summary: Indicates that the control should display the "HP Restricted" label.

member.name: F:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.ContentPrivacyLevel.Public
member.summary: Indicates that the control should display the "HP Public" label.

member.name: F:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.ContentPrivacyLevel.Confidential
member.summary: Indicates that the control should display the "HP Confidential" label.

member.name: F:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalFooter.ContentPrivacyLevel.Private
member.summary: Indicates that the control should display the "HP Private" label.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.PortalScriptUrl_Default
member.summary: The URL of the file containing the default portal script.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.PortalScriptUrl_AtHP
member.summary: The URL of the file containing the portal script used by the AtHP portal site.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.PortalScriptUrl_OldDefault
member.summary: The URL of the file containing the obsolete "v5" version of the portal script.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.PortalScriptUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the file containing the portal script.
member.remarks: Changing this allows you to override the normal portal behavior using custom scripts.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the site title to display at the top center of the banner.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.GreetingMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display as a greeting to the user when a page loads.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.WarningMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the text that is displayed underneath the banner as a \"critical warning to the user\" when a page loads.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.SiteSearchId
member.summary: Gets or sets your SiteSearch ID, which is created by the SiteSearch tool.
member.remarks: NOTE: Entering an incorrect value can cause erroneous results or failure on the Search Results Page.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.SiteSearchTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets your site's "title" as displayed in the SiteSearch area of the Banner.
member.remarks: NOTE: Entering an incorrect value can cause erroneous results or failure on the Search Results Page.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.EnableMyLinks
member.summary: Enables or disables the \"Add MyLinks\" button above the PeopleFinder text box.
member.remarks: The Add MyLinks button allows the end-user to bookmark your page on their MyLinks module located on the homepage of the portal.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.EnableStandardBodyStyles
member.summary: Enables or disables the @hp predefined body type styles.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.EnableLogOn
member.summary: Enables or disables the Login button/link in the banner.
member.remarks: The Login button is normally displayed above the PeopleFinder textbox.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.LogOnSuccessUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a URL to which the user will be redirected after successfully logging in.
member.remarks:
This property is ignored if the
property is false.
If left empty, the user will automatically be redirected to the portal after successfully logging in.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.BreadCrumb1
member.summary: Gets or sets the PortalMenuItem to select within the PortalMenu (Level 1).
member.remarks: The value must exactly match the menu item name.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.BreadCrumb2
member.summary: Gets or sets the PortalMenuItem to select within the PortalMenu (Level 2).
member.remarks: The value must exactly match the menu item name.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalHeader.BreadCrumb3
member.summary: Gets or sets the PortalNavigationControl to select on the left navigation (i.e. PortalNavigationTree).

member.summary: Indicates the current display mode of this control (based on the control's state).

member.summary: Returns the control that contains this control, or null.
member.returns: the control that contains this control, or null

member.summary: Utility method/macro.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalNavigationControl.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed by the control.
member.remarks:
NOTE: If the value of the property is a single pipe character (i.e. "|"), then the control will display as a visible separator.
If the value of the property contains only whitespace (e.g. " "), then the control will display as an invisible spacer with the size relative to the length of the Text value (i.e. the number of whitespace characters).

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalNavigationControl.NavigateUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to link to when the control is clicked.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalNavigationControl.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to an image to display for the control.
member.remarks: When set, the control will display as an image into the left vertical navigation area. No height or width parameters are required. However, if the image is larger than the navigation area, including padding and any visual spacing, the left vertical navigation area expands, effecting page layout. It is recommend that images be no wider than 130 pixels.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalNavigationControl.TargetFrame
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the target window or frame which is targeted by this control's actions.

member.name: P:HP.HPFx.Web.UI.Portal.PortalNavigationControl.DisplayImageOnly
member.summary: Indicates whether the control will display both image and text, or only the image.
